summary: IN RE TO THE DRIVER'S SEAT:  THE CONSUMER'S DAUGHTER WAS IN THE BACK SEAT WHEN SHE ASKED TO PLACE THE SEAT IN AN UPRIGHT POSITION AS IT WAS LYING AGAINST HER KNEES.  THE CONSUMER FOUND A SINGLE BOLT WHICH HAD SNAPPED OFF AND CAUSED THE SEAT TO REMAIN IN THE DOWN POSITION.  (THE METAL LOOKED AS IF IT WERE DEFECTIVE)   *AK   *SCC   *JB
